alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 9:17PM EST until January 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Montezuma and Terre Haute. White River at Edwardsport. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site to Riverton... and at Mount Carmel. White River at Petersburg and at Hazleton. East Fork White River near Rivervale. .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend put several rivers across central Indiana into flood. Minor flooding is expected to continue on the lower Wabash River through this weekend...and on the lower White River through early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Rivervale. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Lowest agricultural lands begin to flood near Rivervale. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EST Thursday was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.1 feet Sunday, January 16. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Friday.
